text: was a Japanese retired politician. He was a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. He served as director general of the now-defunct Defense Agency of Japan in 1990. He died on June 21, 2014 from acute respiratory failure after being hospitalized with pneumonia, aged 88. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Japanese civil servants Category:Politicians from Tokyo Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians
title: Yozo Ishikawa
